title: Diff Eq Given dy/dx part - c

content.question: For the particular solution y = f(x) described in the previous question, find <math> <semantics> <mrow> <munder> <mrow> <mi>lim</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>→</mo> <mi>∞</mi> </mrow> </munder> <mi>f</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@43AB@</annotation> </semantics> </math>.

frqParts.text: For the particular solution y = f(x) described in the previous question, find <math> <semantics> <mrow> <munder> <mrow> <mi>lim</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>→</mo> <mi>∞</mi> </mrow> </munder> <mi>f</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@43AB@</annotation> </semantics> </math>.

topic.text: 1.15: Connecting Limits at Infinity and Horizontal Asymptotes
